EmailTemplate.description: sent for strategy review selected need to send information
EmailTemplate.name: Opportunity Proposal Waiting SReview Alert
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity_Proposal_Waiting__c.Name} request Strategy review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Sourcing Team,
The analysis for this {!Opportunity_Proposal_Waiting__c.Name} has been referred to you for strategy review. Please go to the Government Sourcing shared drive to review and approve the analysis. Please contact the Sourcing Team member if there are any questions and also once the requested review has been completed.
Thank you.
